name: STEM BY STEM
description:
Create your own eco-system and get the best score before the time runs out.

Place elements of nature by clicking on buttons displayed on the right of the screen. Plants and animals accumulated on your island allow you to produce "Stems". The price of these natural elements gradually increase.

 The end goal of the game is to produce as much "Stem" as possible to get the highest score while building a beautiful garden.

(You may need to spam when placing objects, sorry for that)

STEM BY STEM developed  by Boris Corbet and Maxime Potelberg (DJmouton). 

Music assets were made prior to this Game Jam by Guilann O'b
